results.name: a(n) = A080224(A337386(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
Index entries for sequences computed from indices in prime factorization
Index entries for sequences related to sigma(n)
program: A003961(n) = { my(f = factor(n)); for (i=1, #f~, f[i, 1] = nextprime(f[i, 1]+1)); factorback(f); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 01 2020
